articles.title: 'Behemoth star,' previously thought to be dying, is 'rising from the ashes' like a pheonix - Live Science
articles.description: A new study suggests that the red supergiant WOH G64, also known as the "behemoth star," has not transitioned into a yellow hypergiant as previous research suggested. This means it is now unlikely to imminently explode in a colossal supernova.
